title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 1452/85 of 31 May 1985 fixing for the 1985/86 marketing year the reference prices for lemons
header:
COMMISSION  REGULATION (EEC) No 1452/85
of 31 May 1985
fixing for the 1985/86 marketing year the reference prices for lemons
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN
COMMUNITIES
main_body:
For the 1985/86 marketing year, the reference prices for fresh lemons falling within subheading 08.02 C of the Common Customs Tariff, expressed in ECU per 100 kilograms net of packed products of class I, of all sizes, shall be as follows:
June: 49,29
July and August: 54,52
September: 49,92
October: 44,45
November to April: 41,87
May: 42,43

This Regulation shall enter into force on 1 June 1985.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 31 May 1985.
For the Commission
Frans ANDRIESSEN
Vice-President
